Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Bookshelf

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Bookshelf
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Bookshelf extends Object implements Serializable
Class that handles all possible actions that can be performed on a bookshelf

  • Method Details

    • addTiles

      public void addTiles(List<Tile> tiles, int column)
      Add the maximum 3 tiles passed from input to the bookshelf
      Parameters:
      tiles - tiles that need to be added to the bookshelf
      column - number of the column of the bookshelf where tha tiles must be added

    • getTile

      public Tile getTile(Position position)
      Returns the tile at the given position
      Parameters:
      position - position of the tile that needs to be returned
      Returns:
      returns an Optional.empty() if the position contains no tile, otherwise it returns the tile

    • getColumn

      public ArrayList<Tile> getColumn(int columnNumber)
      Returns an ArrayList with all the tiles contained in the column indicated in input
      Parameters:
      columnNumber - indicates the column the tiles must be taken from
      Returns:
      returns all the tiles inside the given column

    • getRow

      public ArrayList<Tile> getRow(int rowNumber)
      Returns an ArrayList with all the tiles contained in the row indicated in input
      Parameters:
      rowNumber - indicates the row the tiles must be taken from
      Returns:
      returns all the tiles that are present in the given row

    • getFreeCells

      public int getFreeCells()
      Returns the number of free cells
      Returns:
      returns the total number of empty cells in the bookshelf

    • getFreeCells

      public int getFreeCells(Integer columnNumber)
      Returns the number of free cells inside the given column
      Parameters:
      columnNumber - number that indicates which column needs to be examined
      Returns:
      return the free cells given a given column
